# Ex04 Places Around Me
## Date: 12.12.2025

## AIM
To develop a website to display details about the places around my house.

## DESIGN STEPS

### STEP 1
Create a Django admin interface.

### STEP 2
Download your city map from Google.

### STEP 3
Using ```<map>``` tag name the map.

### STEP 4
Create clickable regions in the image using ```<area>``` tag.

### STEP 5
Write HTML programs for all the regions identified.

### STEP 6
Execute the programs and publish them.

## CODE
```
home.html
<!-- Image Map Generated by http://www.image-map.net/ -->
<img src="Screenshot 2025-12-12 104614.png" usemap="#image-map">

<map name="image-map">
    <area target="" alt="krishna river" title="krishna river" href="river.html" coords="136,309,104" shape="circle">
    <area target="" alt="simats university" title="simats university" href="simats.html" coords="392,279,573,466" shape="rect">
    <area target="" alt="queens land" title="queens land" href="park.html" coords="1070,147,1006,211,1075,279,1169,234,1168,127" shape="poly">
</map>

park.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Park</title>
</head>
<body bgcolor="white" text="black">
    <img src="QUEENSLAND.jpg"height="600"width="600">
    <p>Queensland amusement park in Chennai is a 70 acre family entertainment destination</p>

</body>
</html>

river.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Park</title>
</head>
<body bgcolor="white" text="black">
    <img src="KRISHNA RIVER.jpg"height="600"width="600">
    <p>The Krishna River is a major South Indian river</p>

</body>
</html>

simats.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Park</title>
</head>
<body bgcolor="white" text="black">
    <img src="SIMATS.jpg"height="600"width="600">
    <p>Saveetha University, officially Saveetha Institute of Medical and Technical Sciences (SIMATS), is a UGC-approved Deemed University in Chennai</p>

</body>
</html>
```


## OUTPUT

![alt text](<map/mapapp/static/Screenshot 2025-12-12 104614.png>)
![alt text](<map/mapapp/static/KRISHNA RIVER.jpg>)
![alt text](map/mapapp/static/QUEENSLAND.jpg)
![alt text](map/mapapp/static/SIMATS.jpg)







## RESULT
The program for implementing image maps using HTML is executed successfully.
